title: Ecommerce Website
description: A fully responsive online store built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a product catalog, interactive UI, add-to-cart functionality, and smooth user experience across devices. Designed with modern layouts and animations to enhance shopping engagement.

title: Full-Stack Website
description: A complete full-stack web application built with Next.js (App Router), Shadcn UI, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, MongoDB, and JWT authentication. The platform provides both a client-facing website for browsing products, authentication, and orders, and an admin dashboard for managing products, users, and analytics. It includes secure role-based access, responsive UI, and modern design for both client and admin sides.

title: Chat App
description: A modern real-time chat application built with React, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Socket.io. It features secure user authentication with JWT, real-time messaging, online status tracking, and clean UI using DaisyUI components. This project demonstrates full-stack development skills with a focus on scalability, responsive design, and real-time communication.
